actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill relating to the protection, management, and control of wild free-roaming horses and burros on Federal lands.
short_title: Wild Free-Roaming Horses and Burros Amendments Act

summary.text: Burros Amendments Act - Affords the same protection to wild free-roaming horses and burros found on lands comprising the National Park System as is afforded to such animals found on public lands.

titles.title: Wild Free-Roaming Horses and Burros Amendments Act
A bill relating to the protection, management, and control of wild free-roaming horses and burros on Federal lands.
